fields.label: Enable hero?
fields.name: enable_hero
fields.instructions: If enabled, set the Featured Image in the module provided to the right.

sub_fields.label: Text Left
sub_fields.name: text_left
sub_fields.instructions: Bold text which appears first.

sub_fields.label: Text Right
sub_fields.name: text_right
sub_fields.instructions: A CTA link, which follows on from the Left Text.

sub_fields.label: CTA Button
sub_fields.name: cta_button
sub_fields.instructions: A stylized button, which appears in the header.

sub_fields.label: Hide on Pages
sub_fields.name: hide_on_pages
sub_fields.instructions: Select any pages you'd like to hide the notification bar on, below.

fields.label: The Venn
fields.name: the_venn
fields.instructions: The primary location. This information is used throughout the website, including the footer and contact page.

fields.label: Leasing Office
fields.name: leasing_office
fields.instructions: The secondary location. This information is used throughout the website, including the footer and contact page.

sub_fields.label: Spacer Height
sub_fields.name: spacer_height
sub_fields.instructions: Enter only a number, either negative or positive.

sub_fields.label: Spacer Measurement
sub_fields.name: spacer_measurement
sub_fields.instructions: Select measurement used to calculate spacer height.

sub_fields.label: Visibility
sub_fields.name: visibility
sub_fields.instructions: Choose which devices you'd like to display the spacer on.

sub_fields.label: Width
sub_fields.name: width
sub_fields.instructions: Enter only a positive number.

sub_fields.label: Measurement
sub_fields.name: measurement
sub_fields.instructions: Select measurement used to calculate width of the horizontal line.

sub_fields.label: Visibility
sub_fields.name: visibility
sub_fields.instructions: Choose which devices you'd like to display the spacer on.

sub_fields.label: Alternate Graphic
sub_fields.name: alternate_graphic
sub_fields.instructions: Regular: large green diamond with smaller sea foam blue diamond. Alternate: large sea foam blue diamond with smaller green diamond.

sub_fields.label: Alignment Style
sub_fields.name: alignment_style
sub_fields.instructions: Style 1: Text to left, image to right, and bottom row opposite. Style 2: Image to left, text to right, and bottom row opposite.

sub_fields.label: Alternate Graphic
sub_fields.name: alternate_graphic
sub_fields.instructions: Regular: large green diamond with smaller sea foam blue diamond. Alternate: large sea foam blue diamond with smaller green diamond.

sub_fields.label: Title
sub_fields.name: title
sub_fields.instructions: Wrap words in tags to place emphasis on them: https://www.w3schools.com/html/html_formatting.asp

sub_fields.label: Hide Row?
sub_fields.name: hide_row
sub_fields.instructions: Toggle to hide the row, if using only one of the two rows.

sub_fields.name: hide_row

sub_fields.name: title
sub_fields.instructions: Wrap words in tags to place emphasis on them: https://www.w3schools.com/html/html_formatting.asp

sub_fields.label: Alignment Style
sub_fields.name: alignment_style
sub_fields.instructions: Style 1: two-column layout, without graphics. Style 2: one-column layout, with graphics. Style 3: single column for title, content and form, and second column for contact details, including graphic.

sub_fields.label: Email Notification Subject
sub_fields.name: email_notification_subject
sub_fields.instructions: Subject of the email notification.

sub_fields.label: Send Notification To
sub_fields.name: send_notification_to
sub_fields.instructions: If blank this will default to the site administrator's email address.

sub_fields.label: Use Labels as Placeholders?
sub_fields.name: use_labels_as_placeholders
sub_fields.instructions: Where possible, use the label as a placeholder.

sub_fields.label: Input Options
sub_fields.name: input_options
sub_fields.instructions: List the options available for the input field.
